thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Dom

author: Dom
title: Dom
text: Had a fantastic time, the skipper/guide was such a great guy and so incredibly knowledgable. He also cooked a lot of meals even though that was meant to be the groups responsibility. Sailing is the best way to see this part of the world as the coastlines are so fantastic... as is arriving into a port surrounded by million dollar yachts! It makes an expensive part of hte world so accessible and the people I met were awesome too.
